title: Register Chocolatey Feed
description: Registers a new Chocolatey package feed.

feedName.description: The name of the new feed.

feedUrl.description: The URL of the new feed. Caution - chocolatey requires a v2 service endpoint.

username.description: Username to use for authenticated feeds.

password.description: Password to use for authenticated feeds.

runCommand.commandToExecute: [concat('powershell.exe -ExecutionPolicy bypass "& ./Artifactfile.ps1 -FeedName ''', parameters('feedName'), ''' -FeedUrl ''', parameters('feedUrl'), ''' -Username ''', parameters('username'), ''' -Password ''', parameters('password'), ''' -DisableDefault ''', parameters('disableDefault'), '''"')]
